Setting.Name: Frontend::ToolBarModule###101-ITSMChangeManagement::ChangeManager
Setting.Description: Agent interface notification module to see the number of changes managed by the user.

Setting.Name: Frontend::ToolBarModule###102-ITSMChangeManagement::MyChanges
Setting.Description: Agent interface notification module to see the number of changes.

Setting.Name: Frontend::ToolBarModule###103-ITSMChangeManagement::MyWorkOrders
Setting.Description: Agent interface notification module to see the number of workorders.

Setting.Name: Frontend::ToolBarModule###104-ITSMChangeManagement::MyCAB
Setting.Description: Agent interface notification module to see the number of change advisory boards.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::Overview###Small
Setting.Description: Defines an overview module to show the small view of a change list.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::TemplateOverview###Small
Setting.Description: Defines an overview module to show the small view of a template list.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###317-ITSMChangeAdd
Setting.Description: Module to show a link to create a change from this ticket. The ticket will be automatically linked with the new change.

Hash.Item: Create a change from this ticket.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###318-ITSMChangeAddFromTemplate
Setting.Description: Module to show a link to create a change from this ticket. The ticket will be automatically linked with the new change.

Hash.Item: Create a change (from template) from this ticket.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###000-Back
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to go back in the change zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###010-History
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the history of a change in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###020-Print
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to print a change in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###030-Edit
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to edit a change in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###040-InvolvedPersons
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to show the involved persons in a change, in the zoom view of the change in the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Change involved persons of the change.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###050-WorkOrderAdd
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to add a workorder in the change zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Add a workorder to the change.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###055-WorkOrderAddFromTemplate
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to add a workorder in the change zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Add a workorder (from template) to the change.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###060-Conditions
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the conditions of a change in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Edit the conditions of the change.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###070-Link
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows linking a change with another object in the change zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Link another object to the change.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###080-MoveTimeSlot
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows moving the time slot of a change in its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###090-Template
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows defining a change as a template in the zoom view of the change, in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###100-ChangeDelete
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to delete a change in its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::MenuModule###110-ChangeReset
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to reset a change and its workorders in its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###000-Back
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to go back in the workorder zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###010-History
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the history of a workorder in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###020-Print
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to print a workorder in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###030-Edit
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to edit a workorder in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###035-Take
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows taking a workorder in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: [% Translate("Take Workorder") | html %]: [% Config("ITSMWorkOrder::Hook") %] [% Data.ChangeNumber | html %] - [% Data.WorkOrderNumber | html %]

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###040-WorkOrderAgent
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows changing the workorder agent, in the zoom view of the workorder of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Set the agent for the workorder.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###050-Report
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows editing the report of a workorder, in the zoom view of the workorder of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###060-Link
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows linking a workorder with another object in the zoom view of the workorder of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Link another object to the workorder.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###080-Template
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows defining a workorder as a template in the zoom view of the workorder, in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Frontend::MenuModule###090-WorkOrderDelete
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to delete a workorder in its zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: [% Translate("Delete") | html %] [% Config("ITSMWorkOrder::Hook") %] [% Data.ChangeNumber | html %]-[% Data.WorkOrderNumber | html %]

Setting.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable::SettingsVisibility###ITSMChangeManagement
Setting.Description: Define Actions where a settings button is available in the linked objects widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Please note that these Actions must have registered the following JS and CSS files: Core.AllocationList.css, Core.UI.AllocationList.js, Core.UI.Table.Sort.js, Core.Agent.TableFilters.js and Core.Agent.LinkObject.js.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable###ITSMChange
Setting.Description: Define which columns are shown in the linked Changes widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Note: Only Change attributes are allowed for DefaultColumns. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Available, 2 = Enabled by default.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable###ITSMWorkOrder
Setting.Description: Define which columns are shown in the linked Workorder widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Note: Only Workorder attributes are allowed for DefaultColumns. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Available, 2 = Enabled by default.

Setting.Name: DynamicField::EventModulePost###100-UpdateITSMChangeConditions
Setting.Description: DynamicField event module to handle the update of conditions if dynamic fields are added, updated or deleted.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::EventModule###01-HistoryAdd
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that updates the history of changes.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::EventModule###02-Notification
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that sends notifications.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::EventModule###03-Condition
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that matches conditions and executes actions.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::EventModule###80-ToolBarChangeManagerCacheDelete
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that deletes the cache for a toolbar.

Setting.Description: ITSM event module that deletes the cache for a toolbar.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::EventModule###82-ToolBarMyCABCacheDelete
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that deletes the cache for a toolbar.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::EventModule###90-ConditionDelete
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that cleans up conditions.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::EventModule###91-HistoryDelete
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that deletes the history of changes.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::EventModule###01-WorkOrderNumberCalc
Setting.Description: ITSM event module to recalculate the workorder numbers.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::EventModule###02-WorkOrderActualTimesSet
Setting.Description: ITSM event module to set the actual start and end times of workorders.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::EventModule###03-HistoryAdd
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that updates the history of workorders.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::EventModule###04-Notification
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that sends notifications.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::EventModule###05-Condition
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that matches conditions and executes actions.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::EventModule###80-ToolBarMyWorkOrdersCacheDelete
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that deletes the cache for a toolbar.

Setting.Name: Daemon::SchedulerCronTaskManager::Task###ITSMChangesCheck
Setting.Description: Run task to check if specific times have been reached in changes and workorders.

Setting.Name: ITSMChangeCronjob::EventModule###01-HistoryAdd
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that updates the history of changes.

Setting.Name: ITSMChangeCronjob::EventModule###02-Notification
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that sends notifications.

Setting.Name: ITSMChangeCronjob::EventModule###03-Condition
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that matches conditions and executes actions.

Setting.Name: ITSMChangeManagementNotification::EventModule###01-HistoryAdd
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that updates the history of changes.

Setting.Name: ITSMCondition::EventModule###01-HistoryAdd
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that updates the history of conditions.

Setting.Name: ITSMCondition::EventModule###02-Notification
Setting.Description: ITSM event module that sends notifications.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::ChangeSearch::MirrorDB
Setting.Description: Defines if the change search and the workorder search functions could use the mirror DB.

Setting.Name: DynamicFields::ObjectType###ITSMChange
Setting.Description: DynamicField object registration.

Setting.Name: DynamicFields::ObjectType###ITSMWorkOrder
Setting.Description: DynamicField object registration.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::CacheTTL
Setting.Description: Cache time in minutes for the change management. Default: 5 days (7200 minutes).

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::ToolBar::CacheTTL
Setting.Description: Cache time in minutes for the change management toolbars. Default: 3 hours (180 minutes).

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::AddChangeLinkTicketTypes
Setting.Description: Types of tickets, where in the ticket zoom view a link to add a change will be displayed.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::RestrictTicketTypes::Groups
Setting.Description: Only users of these groups have the permission to use the ticket types as defined in "ITSMChange::AddChangeLinkTicketTypes" if the feature "Ticket::Acl::Module###200-Ticket::Acl::Module" is enabled.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Hook
Setting.Description: The identifier for a change, e.g. Change#, MyChange#. The default is Change#.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::StateLock::AllowEndStates
Setting.Description: Defines if reachable (as defined by the state machine) change end states should be allowed if a change is in a locked state.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::State::Signal
Setting.Description: Defines the signals for each ITSM change state.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Category::Default
Setting.Description: Defines the default value for the category of a change.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Impact::Default
Setting.Description: Defines the default value for the impact of a change.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Attribute::CompareValue::FieldType
Setting.Description: Defines the field type of CompareValue fields for change attributes used in the change condition edit screen of the agent interface. Valid values are Selection, Text and Date. If a type is not defined, the field will not be shown.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Mapping::Expression::Object::Attribute
Setting.Description: Defines the object attributes that are selectable for change objects in the change condition edit screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Hook
Setting.Description: The identifier for a workorder, e.g. Workorder#, MyWorkorder#. The default is Workorder#.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::StateLock::AllowEndStates
Setting.Description: Defines if reachable (as defined by the state machine) workorder end states should be allowed if a workorder is in a locked state.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::State::Signal
Setting.Description: Define the signals for each workorder state.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::Type::Default
Setting.Description: Default type for a workorder. This entry must exist in general catalog class 'ITSM::ChangeManagement::WorkOrder::Type'.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::ActualStartTimeSet::States
Setting.Description: A list of workorder states, at which the ActualStartTime of a workorder will be set if it was empty at this point.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::TakePermission::List
Setting.Description: A list of the agents who have permission to take workorders. Key is a login name. Content is 0 or 1.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::TimePeriod
Setting.Description: Defines the period (in years), in which start and end times can be selected.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::HistoryOrder
Setting.Description: Shows the change history (reverse ordered) in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChange###Filter::ChangeStates
Setting.Description: Defines the change states that will be used as filters in the change overview.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChange###Order::Default
Setting.Description: Defines the default sort order in the change overview.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChange###Permission
Setting.Description: Required privileges to access the overview of all changes.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChange###ShowColumns
Setting.Description: Defines the shown columns in the change overview. This option has no effect on the position of the column.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChange###SortBy::Default
Setting.Description: Defines the default sort criteria in the change overview.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChangeAdd###Permission
Setting.Description: Required privileges to create changes.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChangeAdd###RequestedTime
Setting.Description: Defines if the requested date should be set by customer.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChangeAdd###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the change add screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChangeAddFromTemplate###Permission
Setting.Description: Required privileges to create changes from templates.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChangeCABTemplate###Permission
Setting.Description: Required privileges to create a template from a changes' CAB.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChangeCondition###Permission
Setting.Description: Required privileges to view the conditions of changes.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChangeConditionEdit###Permission
Setting.Description: Required privileges to edit the conditions of changes.

Setting.Description: Module to check the change manager.

Setting.Description: Module to check the change builder.

Setting.Description: Module to check the workorder agent.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::TakePermission###20-ListAgent
Setting.Description: Module to check whether the agent is contained in the configured list.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Acl::Module###200-Ticket::Acl::Module
Setting.Description: This ACL module restricts the usuage of the ticket types that are defined in the sysconfig option 'ITSMChange::AddChangeLinkTicketTypes', to users of the groups as defined in "ITSMChange::RestrictTicketTypes::Groups". As this ACL could collide with other ACLs which are also related to the ticket type, this sysconfig option is disabled by default and should only be activated if needed.

Setting.Name: ITSMStateMachine::Object###Change
Setting.Description: Sets up the state machine for changes.

Setting.Name: ITSMStateMachine::Object###WorkOrder
Setting.Description: Sets up the state machine for workorders.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::SendNotifications
Setting.Description: Defines whether notifications should be sent.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::TimeReachedNotifications###Frequency
Setting.Description: Configures how often the notifications are sent when planned the start time or other time values have been reached/passed.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::TimeReachedNotifications###Hours
Setting.Description: If frequency is 'regularly', you can configure how often the notifications are sent (every X hours).

Setting.Name: Stats::ExchangeAxis
Setting.Description: Determines if an agent can exchange the X-axis of a stat if he generates one.

Setting.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMChangeManagement
Setting.Description: Determines if the common stats module may generate stats about changes.

Setting.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMChangeManagementHistory
Setting.Description: Determines if the common stats module may generate stats about changes regarding change state updates within a timeperiod.

Setting.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMChangeManagementChangesIncidents
Setting.Description: Determines if the common stats module may generate stats about changes regarding the relation between changes and incident tickets.

Setting.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMChangeManagementRfcRequester
Setting.Description: Determines if the common stats module may generate stats about the number of Rfc tickets a requester created.

Setting.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMChangeManagementChangesPerCIClasses
Setting.Description: Determines if the common stats module may generate stats about changes done for config item classes.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::NumberGenerator
Setting.Description: Selects the change number generator module. "AutoIncrement" increments the change number, the SystemID and the counter are used with SystemID.counter format (e.g. 100118, 100119). With "Date", the change numbers will be generated by the current date and a counter; this format looks like Year.Month.Day.counter, e.g. 2010062400001, 2010062400002. With "DateChecksum", the counter will be appended as checksum to the string of date plus the SystemID. The checksum will be rotated on a daily basis. This format looks like Year.Month.Day.SystemID.Counter.CheckSum, e.g. 2010062410000017, 2010062410000026.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::NumberGenerator::MinCounterSize
Setting.Description: Sets the minimal change counter size (if "AutoIncrement" was selected as ITSMChange::NumberGenerator). Default is 5, this means the counter starts from 10000.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::NumberGenerator::AutoIncrement::MinCounterSize
Setting.Description: Sets the minimal change counter size (if "AutoIncrement" was selected as ITSMChange::NumberGenerator). Default is 5, this means the counter starts from 10000.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::NumberGenerator::Date::UseFormattedCounter
Setting.Description: Enables the minimal change counter size (if "Date" was selected as ITSMChange::NumberGenerator).

Setting.Name: PreferencesGroups###UserCreateWorkOrderNextMask
Setting.Description: Parameters for the UserCreateWorkOrderNextMask object in the preference view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Configure which screen should be shown after a new workorder has been created.

Setting.Name: PreferencesGroups###ChangeOverviewSmallPageShown
Setting.Description: Parameters for the pages (in which the changes are shown) of the small change overview.

Hash.Item: Change limit per page for Change Overview "Small".

Setting.Name: PreferencesGroups###UserITSMChangeManagementTemplateEdit
Setting.Description: Stores change and workorder ids and their corresponding template id, while a user is editing a template.

Hash.Item: Change and workorder templates edited by this user.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Search###Change
Setting.Description: Change search backend router of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Search::JavaScript###Change
Setting.Description: JavaScript function for the search frontend.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentITSMChangeSearch###SearchCSVData
Setting.Description: Data used to export the search result in CSV format.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentHTMLFieldHeightDefault
Setting.Description: Set the default height (in pixels) of inline HTML fields in the change zoom screen and workorder zoom screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::Frontend::AgentHTMLFieldHeightMax
Setting.Description: Set the maximum height (in pixels) of inline HTML fields in the change zoom screen and workorder zoom screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonJS###100-ITSMChangeManagement
Setting.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Events###ITSMChange
Setting.Description: List of all change events to be displayed in the GUI.

Setting.Name: Events###ITSMWorkOrder
Setting.Description: List of all workorder events to be displayed in the GUI.

Setting.Name: ITSMChange::EventModule###1000-GenericInterface
Setting.Description: Performs the configured action for each event (as an Invoker) for each configured Webservice.

Setting.Name: ITSMWorkOrder::EventModule###1000-GenericInterface
Setting.Description: Performs the configured action for each event (as an Invoker) for each configured Webservice.

Setting.Name: Frontend::AdminModuleGroups###200-ITSMChangeManagement
Setting.Description: Defines available groups for the admin overview screen.
